subject: Hello Mr. Christopher
body:
Dear sir,
                                   YOU REALLY NEED HELP
You really need help to actualize your long-delayed payment.

I am telling you this because the release of foreign contract and
inheritance funds has become a tough nut to crack due to the wicked,
immoral and criminal activities of some highly-placed officials.

If I can help other beneficiaries, I can equally help you. I see what I am
doing as a service to humanity. That is why I am determined and committed
to facilitating the release of these long-delayed foreign contract and
inheritance funds.

In fact, I have received threats after threats, but I am focused and remain
resolute.

Don't worry, I assure you that I will complete your payment and I will not
let you down.

I am waiting for your response.
Regards,
Samuel Uwa.

subject: Re: Hello Mr. Christopher
body:
Hello Samuel Uwa,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your commitment and dedication to helping with the release of foreign contract and funds. It sounds like a challenging task, especially with the threats you've been receiving.

Could you please provide more details about how this process works? And how exactly can I be of help in this situation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher
